attributes.action: Have a tick box on the general election voting form to indicate that this person does not want to vote for any of the above candidate parties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will stop or at least reduce protest voting for totaly unsuitable groups. It will certainly give the voter a more direct opportunity to convey their feelings.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
